trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> event is raised for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> that is visible on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>evento é gerado para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>que está visível <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, set the properties in a DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs to change the appearance of the cell instead of directly accessing a cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Para melhorar o desempenho, defina as propriedades num DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs para alterar o aspeto da célula em vez de aceder diretamente uma célula numa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the cell, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se manualmente de pintura de célula, defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you do not set <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to `true`, the cell will paint over your customizations.
trans-unit.target: Se não definir <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para `true`, célula irá pintura através das personalizações.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the cell to be painted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que contém a célula ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para pintura o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tem de ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados formatados do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro que está associada a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de formatação e estilo sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que contém os estilos do limite para a célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores especificando as partes de pintura.

trans-unit.source: dataGridView is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewis .

trans-unit.source: -or- graphics is .
trans-unit.target: -or- graphics is .

trans-unit.source: -or- cellStyle is .
trans-unit.target: -or- cellStyle is .

trans-unit.source: paintParts is not a valid bitwise combination of values.
trans-unit.target: paintPartsNão é uma combinação bit a bit válida de valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo do limite de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Change the borders of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the AdvancedBorderStyle property to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: Alterar os limites de atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>definindo as propriedades da propriedade AdvancedBorderStyle como um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>valores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo de limite de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Get the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obter dos limites da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de célula de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Change the appearance of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the CellStyle property.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o aspeto da atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>definindo as propriedades da propriedade CellStyle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains the cell style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que contém o estilo de célula de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tem de ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: The ClipBounds property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ClipBounds representa a área do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>que tem de ser repainted.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window, and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um utilizador abrange todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>com outra janela e, em seguida, uncovers, em seguida, ClipBounds representa todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Se um utilizador abrange uma área de pequena a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>e, em seguida, uncovers, em seguida, ClipBounds representa a área de pequena que foi abrangida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tem de ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de coluna da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnIndex property returns -1 when a row header cell is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ColumnIndex devolve -1 quando uma célula de cabeçalho de linha está a ser desenhada.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que representa uma mensagem de erro para o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is a row header cell, the ErrorText property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Quando atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>for uma célula de cabeçalho de linha, a propriedade ErrorText é o mesmo que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: When the current cell is a data cell, ErrorText is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a célula actual for uma célula de dados, ErrorText é o mesmo que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa uma mensagem de erro para o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor formatado da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FormattedValue property contains the value of the cell after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property has been applied to it, and after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event has been handled.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade FormattedValue contém o valor da célula após o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>propriedade foi aplicada ao mesmo e, depois do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento tenha sido processado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor formatado da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para atual de pintura <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para atual de pintura <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified parts of the cell for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Desenha as partes especificadas da célula para a área dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> Especifica que a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores especificando as partes de pintura.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <>*> é inferior a -1 ou superior ou igual ao número de linhas a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo. - ou - <> </> *> é inferior a -1 ou superior ou igual ao número de colunas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell background for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem de fundo de célula para a área dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> Especifica que a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para a imagem de fundo dos limites especificados com a cor de pintura o <> </> *> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para a imagem de fundo dos limites especificados com a cor de pintura o <> </> *> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <>*> é inferior a -1 ou superior ou igual ao número de linhas a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo. - ou - <> </> *> é inferior a -1 ou superior ou igual ao número de colunas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell content for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o conteúdo da célula para a área dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> Especifica que a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: The cell parts that are to be painted.
trans-unit.target: As partes de célula estão a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores especificando as partes ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de linha da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The RowIndex property returns -1 when a column header is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RowIndex devolve -1 quando está a ser pintado um cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de actual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Value property contains the value of the cell before any formatting occurs.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Value contém o valor da célula antes de qualquer formatação ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.
